title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw
name: neotw
author: oeyoews
text: {"tiddlers":{"neotw/repo-button":{"title":"neotw/repo-button","caption":"repo button","description":"repo button","list-after":"","tags":"$:/tags/PageControls","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\whitespace trim \define base-repo() https://gitlab.com/ \define target() oeyoews/neotw <$button tooltip="Jump to repo" aria-label="GRB" class=<>> addprefix]}}} target="_blank"> {{$:/images/gitlab}} "},"neotw/library":{"title":"neotw/library","description":"neotw library","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","caption":"neotw library","url":"https://neotw.netlify.app/library/index.html"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/readme","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"* this is a neotw packed edition plugin * this is a dmeo "},"neotw/copy-text":{"title":"neotw/copy-text","caption":"copy code","description":"copy text","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\whitespace trim <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param={{!!text}} tooltip="copy current code" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{neotw/svg/vscode}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> "},"neotw/viewbar/copy-title":{"title":"neotw/viewbar/copy-title","caption":"Copy Tiddler Title","description":"Copy the name of this tiddler to the clipboard","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\whitespace trim <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param={{!!title}} tooltip="copy current title" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/copy-clipboard}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> "}}}
